info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 12 at 3:46AM EDT until July 12 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM EDT /6 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Waves 3 to 5 feet this morning subsiding to 2 to 3 feet this afternoon. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte county. In Michigan, Berrien county. * WHEN...From 7 AM EDT /6 AM CDT/ this morning through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
